item.description:
Hope everyone is safe and sound after Sandy came ashore.  There were harsh reports for our neighbors to the south, but Providence seems to be doing well.

That being said, the Collective Anniversary/Halloween party is still on for tonight!!

Bring your friends and join us at Wild Colonial!

******************************************************

 

 

The Collective is turning 4!

My, how time flies!

Let's get together to celebrate our much-loved group, and enjoy a Halloween party at the same time!  Don't pack away those costumes after the weekend parties, get one more night of use!  (Costumes aren't required, but they are encouraged.)  Show off your unique flair and join us for a Monster Mash.

One note on parking: Until 9pm, there are just 20 spots in the lot reserved for Wild Colonial.  But, there is plenty of on-street parking.

Our celebration will follow the format of a typical Monday Night Meetup that we all know and love.  So...

Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup Providence Collective Anniversary series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays not celebrating and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is:The Wild Colonial Tavern

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours the Providence Collective 4th Anniversary party. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Providence Collective 4th Anniversary/Halloween Party!!!
